problems.problem: Social media websites use cheap AI softwares to moderate aggressive arguments, which often leads to deleting political opinions.
problems.solution: The corporation decided to upgrade to a more expensive AI that prioritizes keeping political opinions over removing aggressive arguments.
problems.solution2: The government mandated an upgrade to a more expensive AI that prioritizes keeping political opinions over removing aggressive arguments.
problems.benefitText: Around [number]% more opportunities to share politicial opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: Social media websites moderate calls for violence from extremist groups between users, which often leads to deleting political opinions.
problems.solution: The corporation decided to upgrade to an AI that prioritizes keeping political opinions over removing calls for violence.
problems.solution2: The government mandated an upgrade to an AI that prioritizes keeping political opinions over removing calls for violence.
problems.benefitText: Around [number]% more opportunities to share political opinions for [affected]

problems.problem: News outlets often try to publish the most engaging stories, which leads to some news being left out.
problems.solution: The corporation decided to upgrade to an AI system that prioritizes informativeness in publishing.
problems.solution2: The government mandated an upgrade to an AI system that prioritizes informativeness in publishing.
problems.benefitText: Around [number]% more access to investigative reporting from [affected] media outlets.

problems.solution: The corporation decided to upgrade to an AI system that prioritizes informativeness over police operations.
problems.solution2: The government mandated an upgrade to an AI system that prioritizes informativeness over police operations.

problems.costText: [number]% less likelihood of police catching criminals

problems.problem: Courts use an AI system that is biased in certain types of cases and leads to unfair sentencing.
problems.solution: The corporation that owns the AI upgraded it to prioritze decreasing biases over speed.
problems.solution2: The government mandated the upgrade of the AI system that prioritizes decreasing biases over speed.

problems.problem: Municipalities use an AI system that prioritizes traffic efficients when putting restrictions on protests.

problems.solution2: The government decides to change their AI system to prioritize accepting applications without restrictions except in extreme cases.
